sentences.en: A : Yes , I bought this toaster here yesterday, but it doesn't work.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我昨天在这里买了这个烤面包机, 但是它不能用.

sentences.en: B . Yes. I had this toaster fixed here last week.
sentences.cn: 是的. 这个烤面包器是我上周在这儿修理的.

sentences.en: Billy takes two slices of bread from the breadbox, puts them into the automatic toaster.
sentences.cn: 皮利从面包盒子里拿了两片面包, 放在自动烤炉上.

sentences.en: Dodge the ram attack and attack the toaster when it falls down.
sentences.cn: 躲避它的冲撞并在其停下后攻击它.

sentences.en: Go with flatbread, a bit of cooking oil, sauce, cheese, and toppings, and a (toaster) oven.
sentences.cn: 只需要一个大饼，一烹调油，酱，奶酪和配料，和一个烤箱位，烤面包机都成。

sentences.en: I went to buy a toaster and it came with a bank.
sentences.cn: 本打算买个小烤炉,结果买了一间银行回来.

sentences.en: Is this the toaster you were telling me about?
sentences.cn: 你跟我说的就是这个烤面包机 吗 ?

sentences.en: My lamp uses 60 watts; my toaster uses 600 watts.
sentences.cn: 我的灯用60瓦, 我的烤面包器用600瓦.

sentences.en: The new Bodum collection, BISTRO toaster in all shades of the rainbow.
sentences.cn: 新博达姆出售收集, 餐馆烤面包机在形形色色的彩虹.

sentences.en: The player with Television and the Toaster on the table wins.
sentences.cn: 在桌面上放有电视和烤面包机的玩家获胜.

sentences.en: The toaster has warmed the bread.
sentences.cn: 烤面包器已烤热了面包.

sentences.en: The toaster was still functional even after being dropped.
sentences.cn: 烤面包机虽然摔过但仍可以用.

sentences.en: Toaster: Luxury and top grade design, fashion and novel appearance.
sentences.cn: 多士炉: 豪华高档设计, 外观新颖时尚.

sentences.en: We have egg muffins, French toaster and tuna sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 有满福堡 、 法国土司跟鲔鱼三明治.

sentences.en: When I plugged in the toaster, the lights went out.
sentences.cn: 当我把烤面包炉一插上电源, 电灯就熄了.

sentences.en: Wipe kettle, toaster and other bench top kitchen top appliances.
sentences.cn: 擦净水壶 、 吐司机以及其它厨房台面上的器具.

words.tran_cn: 宴会主持人，主持人；致敬酒辞者，祝酒提议人
烤面包器，烤箱；祝酒人；烤面包的人

trans.tran_en: a machine you use for toasting bread
